title: JavaScript BI & Analytics Dashboard
excerpt: Build lightning-fast dashboards that handle millions of data points. Combine an interactive datagrid with advanced charts to uncover insights in real-time.

title: Automated Financial Reporting Suite (.NET)
excerpt: Generate and export complex financial statements and invoices. Combine powerful reporting with seamless PDF and Excel document management.

title: Embed a Web-Based Office Suite
excerpt: Empower users with Excel-like spreadsheet editing and a robust document viewer for PDFs and Office files, all within your web application.

title: Cross-Platform Data Apps with .NET MAUI
excerpt: Build native mobile and desktop apps that display and manage business data. Use powerful datagrids and input controls for a single .NET MAUI codebase.

title: Interactive Project Management App (Web)
excerpt: Develop a complete project planning solution. Embed a feature-rich Gantt chart to manage tasks, dependencies, and resources in your web app.

title: High-Speed Document Processing API (.NET)
excerpt: Create, load, and manipulate complex PDF and Office documents on the server. A high-performance API for all your backend document workflows.

title: Modernize .NET Desktop Applications
excerpt: Upgrade your legacy WinForms & WPF applications with modern, high-performance UI controls for data management and visualization.

title: Build Full-Stack Enterprise Apps with Blazor
excerpt: Create powerful, data-heavy line-of-business applications using our complete suite of native Blazor UI components, from grids to charts.

title: Digital Lab & Scientific Notebook (Web)
excerpt: Combine a powerful spreadsheet with advanced data visualization tools to create interactive lab notebooks and research data apps.
